text: @realDonaldTrump The travel ban that wasn’t a travel ban? The travel ban that still allowed over 40,000 people to travel afterwards? The travel ban that was enacted AFTER we confirmed the first coronavirus infected person was already in America? You are an incompetent fool. #Biden2020
